data.title: Early Round B Main Paranoia + B Exec Paranoia
data.description: Use this early round B Main Paranoia to make it more difficult for enemy players to attempt to contest B Main, and create opportunities for your team to push into B Main.

data.title: Standard A Site Dark Cover Placement + Simple Paranoia
data.description: Use these standard smokes when executing onto A Site, and combo it with your paranoia just before your team pushes out of A Main to create opportunities for them.

data.title: Standard B Site Dark Cover Placement + Simple Paranoia
data.description: Use these standard smokes when executing onto B Site, and combo it with your Paranoia just before your team pushes out of B Main to create opportunities for them.
